name: Gojek
desc: Gojek is a technology-driven super app in Indonesia offering a range of services including ride-hailing, food delivery, digital payments, and logistics.

name: Tokopedia
desc: Tokopedia is a leading e-commerce platform in Indonesia that allows businesses and individuals to buy and sell products, offering a range of categories from electronics to everyday essentials.

name: Bukalapak
desc: Bukalapak is one of the largest e-commerce platforms in Indonesia, focusing on empowering small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to sell products online.

name: Traveloka
desc: Traveloka is an Indonesian travel and lifestyle platform that offers a wide variety of services, including booking flights, hotels, train tickets, and activities.

name: PLN (Perusahaan Listrik Negara)
desc: PLN is the state-owned electricity company in Indonesia that is responsible for the generation, distribution, and retail of electricity across the country.

name: SpaceX
desc: SpaceX is a private aerospace manufacturer and space transportation company founded by Elon Musk, aiming to reduce the cost of space travel and enable the colonization of Mars.

name: Nvidia
desc: Nvidia is a technology company best known for its graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming and artificial intelligence applications, and also provides solutions for deep learning and autonomous vehicles.

name: Apple
desc: Apple is a leading global technology company known for its innovative consumer electronics, including the iPhone, iPad, MacBook, and software ecosystem including iOS and macOS.

name: Amazon
desc: Amazon is an American multinational technology company that started as an online bookstore and has grown into one of the worldâ€™s largest e-commerce platforms, cloud computing service providers, and entertainment producers.

name: Tesla
desc: Tesla is an electric vehicle and clean energy company founded by Elon Musk, known for producing electric cars, solar energy solutions, and energy storage products.
